name: Gemini Robotics-ER 1.5 Preview
description: First thinking model optimized for embodied reasoning in robotics. Excels at spatial understanding, task planning, and reasoning about physical constraints. Tunable thinking budget balances latency vs accuracy.
notes: PREVIEW - Specialized for robotics with state-of-the-art spatial understanding. Native tool calling including Google Search. Flexible thinking budget for latency/accuracy tradeoff. Output tokens include thinking tokens. Audio input priced at $1.00/1M tokens. Free tier available.
